channel.title: Can we let chilled players talk to the Reaper please?
channel.description: It would make being chilled more fun, I want to let the Reaper know how bad of a player he is for chilling me of all people and how is he going to lose 100%.

item.title: Can we let chilled players talk to the Reaper please?
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
So let Reaper talk to chilled players anonymously also? That would be cool, might require a new “Reaper” chat tab though.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we let chilled players talk to the Reaper please?

item.title: Can we let chilled players talk to the Reaper please?
item.dc:creator: Superkran
item.description:
this can also be used to communicate with neutrals privately thus increasing the reaper’s winrate, which I definitely support.
